subject: Implement core checklist reconciliation engine
description:
Create the main reconciliation logic:
- reconcileArtifact(artifactType, content) - main entry
- detectDrift(entry, artifactType, content) - hash comparison
- compareItems(registryItems, artifactItems) - item diff
- resolveConflicts(conflicts) - newest-wins logic

Location: hooks/src/sync/checklist_reconciler.ts
